name: pie-players
description: PIE players monorepo (assessment + item players + tooling)

scripts.lint: bun run lint:biome && bun run lint:svelte
scripts.lint:all: bun run lint && bun run check && bun run typecheck && bun run check:package-metadata && bun run check:deps && bun run check:source-exports
scripts.dev:item: dotenvx run -- bun run --cwd apps/item-demos dev
scripts.preview:item: dotenvx run -- bun run --cwd apps/item-demos preview
scripts.dev:section:cdn: dotenvx run -- bun run --cwd apps/section-demos dev:cdn
scripts.dev:section:cdn-debug: dotenvx run -- bun run --cwd apps/section-demos dev:cdn-debug
scripts.preview:section: dotenvx run -- bun run --cwd apps/section-demos preview
scripts.dev:docs: dotenvx run -- bun run --cwd apps/docs dev
scripts.preview:docs: NODE_ENV=production bun run --cwd apps/docs build && dotenvx run -- bun run --cwd apps/docs preview
scripts.build:pages: bun run build && NODE_ENV=production bun run --cwd apps/docs build
scripts.verify:publish: bun run build && bun run check:package-metadata && bun run check:custom-elements && bun run check:publint && bun run check:types-publish && bun run check:pack-exports && bun run check:pack-smoke && bun run check:deps && bun run check:source-exports && bun run check:consumer-boundaries && bun run check:runtime-compat
scripts.deploy:master: bun run version && bun run release
scripts.release:label: node ./scripts/create-release-label.mjs
scripts.registry:reset: docker compose down -v && bun scripts/verdaccio.ts start
